ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectOrder directing the National Energy Board to issue a Certificate of Public Convenience and Necessity OC-063 to Enbridge Pipelines Inc.
PrecisOrder directing the National Energy Board (NEB) to issue a CERTIFICATE OF PUBLIC CONVENIENCE AND NECESSITY OC-063 to ENBRIDGE PIPELINES INC. in respect of the proposed construction and operation of the Line 3 Replacement Program, subject to the terms and conditions set out in Appendix III of the NEB Report of April 25, 2016 entitled Enbridge Pipelines Inc. OH-002-2015.
